description: Equipping anchors or bolting in softer rock? These beefy hangers are for use with 1/2in or 12mm bolts, and conform to the 2018 update to CE standards.316L stainless steel provides excellent corrosion resistance.Rounded inner hanger edge for less carabiner wear.Strength is 25kN down, 25kN straight out.3 anti-rotation pins help hold hanger in the intended orientation.
name: Fixe 316 SS Bolt Hanger 12mm
